verses.text: O God, thou hast cast us off, thou hast scattered us, Thou hast been displeased; O turn thyself to us again.
Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: Heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.
Thou hast shewed thy people hard \add things:\add* Thou hast made us to drink the wine \add of\add* astonishment.
Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, That \add it\add* may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.
That thy beloved may be delivered; Save \add with\add* thy right hand, and hear me.
God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, And mete out the valley of Succoth.
Gilead \add is\add* mine, and Manasseh \add is\add* mine; Ephraim also \add is\add* the strength of mine head; Judah \add is\add* my lawgiver;
Moab \add is\add* my washpot; Over Edom will I cast out my shoe: Philistia, triumph thou because of me.
Who will bring me \add into\add* the strong city? Who will lead me into Edom?
\add Wilt\add* not thou, O God, \add which\add* hadst cast us off? And \add thou\add*, O God, \add which\add* didst not go out with our armies?
Give us help from trouble: For vain \add is\add* the help of man.
Through God we shall do valiantly: For he \add it is that\add* shall tread down our enemies.
